toolbar.whatisthis.title: What is this?
toolbar.whatisthis.description_1: This is a digital representation of the <wikiLink>Mengenlehreuhr</wikiLink> with the help of open-source libraries like <motionLink>motion</motionLink>, <reactLink>React</reactLink>, and <tailwindLink>Tailwind</tailwindLink>.
toast.clock_paused.title: Clock is paused!
toast.clock_paused.description: The clock will remain in this state until you use the reset buttons.
toolbar.touch.info: Tap here to control the clock!
